casebody.data:
Lenton C. BROWN
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, an agency of the State of North Carolina, and Division of Adult Correction and Juvenile Justice, a subunit contained within the North Carolina Department of Public Safety No. 437P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Walter S. Webster, Goldsboro, Attorney at Law, for Brown, Lenton C. Ms. Tamika L. Henderson, Raleigh, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department of Public Safety, et al *590ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 28th of December 2017 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
